body:
It helps you to improve your fps using less render distance without sacrificing the appearance of the game!

You can even use custom sky with 2 chunks!

1.7/1.8/1.9/1.10

Download in the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zJ-bdFwjJmI

enjoy :^)
